Name: ActivistShorts
Text: 25% of all activist short campaigns launched in 2017 were made against companies in the healthcare sector. https://t.co/ef515sqqt3
clean_text: 25% OF ALL ACTIVIST SHORT CAMPAIGNS LAUNCHED IN 2017 WERE MADE AGAINST COMPANIES IN THE HEALTHCARE SECTOR

Name: ActivistShorts

Name: ActivistShorts
